item.title: Blender - Notes
item.description: It is finally time to start exploring Blender. I have had this on my todo list for a long time but there were alot of other things to focus on first.So lets dive in! UI Panels Editor Type To change the editor type LMB click the top left corner of a panel and select an editor from the popup widget. Split/Join/Swap RMB click the thin border between to areas to get options to do this.
